S

setWaitingTime(long) - Method in class API.SwitchDetector
Sets the current waiting time.
start() - Method in class API.SwitchDetector
Starts the measurement-process.
stop() - Method in class API.SwitchDetector
Stops the current measurement process.
Does nothing if SwitchDetector.isRunning() is already false.
SWITCH_DOWN - Static variable in class API.SwitchEvent
If the lower switch half is pressed down.
SWITCH_NAN - Static variable in class API.SwitchEvent
If the switch position is unknown or if there is no fitting category.
SWITCH_UP - Static variable in class API.SwitchEvent
If the upper switch half is pressed down.
SwitchDetector - Class in API
A detector that measures changes of the switch position and notifies listeners.
SwitchDetector.start() must be executed once to start the measurement process.
See SwitchDetector.start() for details on the measurement process and different listeners.
Use SwitchDetector.addListener(SwitchListener) to add a SwitchListener.
SwitchDetector() - Constructor for class API.SwitchDetector
 
SwitchEvent - Class in API
A class to store information on the switch after it has been pressed.
SwitchEvent(long, long, int) - Constructor for class API.SwitchEvent
Initiates a new SwitchEvent.
SwitchListener - Interface in API
A switch listener for events detected by the SwitchDetector-class.
switchPosition - Variable in class API.SwitchEvent
The position of the switch after it has been pressed.
